description: 5% Cash Back on up to $1,500 in combined purchases at Amazon.com, Zappos.com and select department stores from October 1 - December 31, 2014. Unlimited 1% Cash Back on all other purchases.

2X points on travel and dining at restaurants. Plus, earn an additional point per dollar spent when you book airfare & hotel accommodations through Chase Ultimate Rewards. 1 point per dollar spent on all other purchases.

t: Discover More Card with Cash Back Bonus
description: 5% cash back for online shopping and department store purchases on up to $1,500 - Oct. through Dec. 2014 when you sign up. Earn .25% cash back on your first $3000 in annual purchases and all warehouse purchases made at warehouse clubs, wholesale distributors, discount stores and their affiliates. Earn 1% on purchases over $3000.
1% cash back on purchases everywhere, every time. 2% at grocery stores and 3% on gas for the first $1,500 in combined grocery store and gas purchases each quarter.
Earn 3 points for every $1 spent on Amazon.com. Earn 2 points for every eligible $1 spent at gas stations, restaurants, office supply stores, and drugstores. Earn 1 point for every other $1 spent.

5% cash back for online shopping and department store purchases on up to $1,500 - Oct. through Dec. 2014 when you sign up. 5% cash back at Six Flags on up to $200 in purchases from July through December 2014 when you sign up. 1% cash back on all other purchases.

t: TrueEarnings Card from Costco and American Express
description: 3% Cash back at US gas stations and on gasoline at Costco up to $4,000 per year in purchases, then 1%. 2% cash back at US restaurants. 2% cash back on eligible travel purchases, including at Costco. 1% cash back on other purchases, including at Costco.

t: Blue Cash Everyday Card from American Express
description: 3% Cash Back at U.S. supermarkets, up to $6,000 per year in purchases (then 1%). 2% cash back at U.S. gas stations. 2% Cash Back at select U.S. department stores 1% Cash Back on other purchases.

t: Starwood Preferred Guest Credit Card from American Express
description: Earn 2 Starpoints® for each dollar of eligible purchases charged directly with hotels and resorts participating in the SPG® program. Earn 1 Starpoint® for each dollar of eligible purchases.

t: The Platinum Card from American Express
description: Earn 2 points for booking with American Express Travel. Earn 1 point on all other purchases.
